data.title: kotekan: High performance radio data processing pipeline
data.name: kotekan
data.description: High performance radio data processing pipeline

evidence: "This project is built using cmake, so you will need to install cmake before starting a build. To build just the base framework: cd build; cmake <options> ..; make" (indicates users build and use from source repository)
"To run in debug mode, run from `ch_gpu/build/kotekan/` sudo ./kotekan -c <config_file>.yaml" (shows it is an executable application run by users)

"If running with no options then kotekan just starts a rest server, and waits for someone to send it a config in json format on port `12048`" (indicates it is a research data-processing/service application, not a generic library)

checks.reason: no binaries found in the repo
